newsitem.title: UK: London taxi drivers vote for Computer Cab float.
newsitem.headline: London taxi drivers vote for Computer Cab float.

text.p: London taxi drivers have backed the proposed flotation of Computer Cab Co Limited, the UK's largest licensed taxi operator.
The licensed Taxi Drivers' Association (LTDA) said in a statement on Monday that over 60 percent of their members had voted for the planned flotation on London's Alternative Investment Market.
LTDA general secretary Bob Oddy said he was "delighted that good sense has prevailed," despite objections raised by a minority of members at the meeting.
